name: psr1crng

stmt.origin: opsrcrng(c1, c1o, c0, emptycls, con0, wcel(c0, ccrg))
stmt.pretty: opsrcrng(c1, c1o, c0, emptycls, con0, c0 ∈ CRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, ccrg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c0), emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1o, con0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c0, ccrg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CRing → c1 ∈ CRing)
⊣ c1 =((1o[ordPwSer]c0)` ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CRing → 1o ∈ On)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CRing → c0 ∈ CRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CRing → ∅ ⊆(1o × 1o))
